import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-convertidor', templateUrl: './convertidor.component.html', styleUrls: ['./convertidor.component.css'] }) export class ConvertidorComponent { cantidad = 0; monedaOriginal = "USD"; monedaDestino = "EUR"; total = 0; listaMonedas: string[] = ['USD', 'EUR', 'QTZ']; realizarConversion() { } }

100 Quetzales EQUIVALEN A 7.95 Dolares
